page.title: 07CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: {DRAMATIC SOCIETY }This society has been going since 1880. There are plays at Easter and a pantomime at Christmas.All ages go although the younger ones usually join in the pantomime at Christmas. People join the society but do catering instead of performing on stage. {BRITISH LEGION}Members are servicemen, ex_members of the forces. They play darts, skittles, snooker, billiards and bingo. They open 7 nights a week. The British Legion are also the founders of the poppy appeal. To be a member you would pay Â£3.50 a year. {ARTS APPRECIATION SOCIETY }This society basically appreciates all kinds of arts such as interests in buildings and paintings. There are trips organised for days out to plays, ballets, concerts, or to the theatre at Southampton, Poole, Salisbury,
